Info.ToolboxConfigModel:
{"entries":[{"content":{"appGalleryLabel":{"content":{"categoryID":"Deployment_Category_f615531a-5e2a-4e3c-8c16-f56da93b5f57","labelID":"Deployment_ToolboxAppGalleryFiles_f615531a-5e2a-4e3c-8c16-f56da93b5f57"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ProjectLabel","uuid":"dcd2a16f-df2b-46eb-a9ba-f5ca4a560b0e"},"authorEmail":"vhtmfu@outlook.com","authorName":"埃博拉酱","authorOrganization":"一致行动党","description":"埃博拉酱的MATLAB扩展工具箱，提供一系列MATLAB内置函数所欠缺，但却常用的增强功能。还替官方修复了许多内置函数的bug。

目录
本工具箱中所有函数均在MATLAB命名空间下，使用前需import。

+MATLAB
+Containers 实现多种STL容器
+Database MariaDB JDBC 数据库相关操作
+DataFun 数值统计操作
+DataTypes 元胞、表格、结构等特殊容器类型的复杂操作
+ElFun 数值变换
+ElMat 数组形状变换
+General 变量、路径、工作区操作
+Graphics 图窗和绘图操作
+ImageSci 读入图像
+IO 文件和ZIP档案操作
+IOFun 文件、网络、内存读写相关
+Lang 函数使用、定义、异常工具、语言功能
+Ops 逻辑和集合操作
+Project 工程相关
+RandFun 随机概率分布洗牌
+SpecFun 穷举、椭圆周长
+SupportPkg 一键获取MATLAB硬件支持包
+UITools 文件打开和保存对话框
还有一些尚未归类的工具函数直接放在MATLAB包下","gettingStartedGuideLabel":{"content":{"categoryID":"Deployment_Category_f615531a-5e2a-4e3c-8c16-f56da93b5f57","labelID":"Deployment_GettingStartedGuideFile_f615531a-5e2a-4e3c-8c16-f56da93b5f57"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ProjectLabel","uuid":"54e02641-bdd9-45c8-8f79-98d1404a077e"},"maxRelease":"R2025a","minRelease":"R2024b","outputFileName":"埃博拉酱的MATLAB扩展.mltbx","outputFolder":"/","requiredAddons":[{"content":{"addonName":"埃博拉酱的MATLAB扩展","earliestVersion":"19.5.0","excluded":true,"latestVersion":"19.5.0","uniqueId":"d0a3672f-3b10-424c-868b-3cb64e588934"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.RequiredAddon","uuid":"6ffb91a3-ac83-466d-8f86-83ed768b864b"},{"content":{"addonName":"埃博拉酱的文本分析工具箱","earliestVersion":"1.0.4","excluded":true,"latestVersion":"1.0.4","uniqueId":"49f10a66-12e1-4a02-bc1c-fef8447af60b"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.RequiredAddon","uuid":"55674fe5-5066-4b73-84c6-378d97d6e7b4"}],"summary":"提供许多内置函数的bug修复（是的，我们有在替官方修bug）、功能升级版，以及一系列内置函数所欠缺，但却常用的增强功能（部分功能仅支持Windows系统）。例如，MariaDB数据库相关操作、序列化字节和反序列化、统一各坐标区的XYZC轴范围、斐波那契插值、全局键值对……","supportedPlatforms":["Windows","Linux","Mac","MatlabOnline"],"toolboxFolder":"/","toolboxImgLabel":{"content":{"categoryID":"Deployment_Category_f615531a-5e2a-4e3c-8c16-f56da93b5f57","labelID":"Deployment_ToolboxImageFile_f615531a-5e2a-4e3c-8c16-f56da93b5f57"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ProjectLabel","uuid":"f1dbb896-c80e-4ac0-a242-c9be3493bf94"},"toolboxName":"埃博拉酱的MATLAB扩展","toolboxVersion":"19.5.2","uniqueId":"d0a3672f-3b10-424c-868b-3cb64e588934"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ToolboxConfiguration","uuid":"d1acd8bf-3e8b-415c-8ec3-9d9be70efeec"},{"content":{},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ProjectStateValidationIssueList","uuid":"ff21a168-15ac-46c8-be16-7b0924b7c584"}],"packageUris":["http://schema.mathworks.com/mf0/deployment_toolbox_model/1.0.0"],"version":"1.0"}
